   20: -module(uri_string_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function, [{http_uri, encode, 1}]}).
   24: -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function, [{http_uri, decode, 1}]}).
   25: 
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,
   27:          normalize/1, normalize_map/1, normalize_return_map/1, normalize_negative/1,
   28:          normalize_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo/1,
   29:          normalize_binary_pct_encoded_query/1,
   30:          normalize_binary_pct_encoded_fragment/1,
   31:          normalize_pct_encoded_userinfo/1,
   32:          normalize_pct_encoded_query/1,
   33:          normalize_pct_encoded_fragment/1,
   34:          normalize_pct_encoded_negative/1,
   35:          parse_binary_fragment/1, parse_binary_host/1, parse_binary_host_ipv4/1,
   36:          parse_binary_host_ipv6/1,
   37:          parse_binary_path/1, parse_binary_pct_encoded_fragment/1, parse_binary_pct_encoded_query/1,
   38:          parse_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo/1, parse_binary_port/1,
   39:          parse_binary_query/1, parse_binary_scheme/1, parse_binary_userinfo/1,
   40:          parse_fragment/1, parse_host/1, parse_host_ipv4/1, parse_host_ipv6/1,
   41:          parse_path/1, parse_pct_encoded_fragment/1, parse_pct_encoded_query/1,
   42:          parse_pct_encoded_userinfo/1, parse_port/1,
   43:          parse_query/1, parse_scheme/1, parse_userinfo/1,
   44: 	 parse_list/1, parse_binary/1, parse_mixed/1, parse_relative/1,
   45:          parse_special/1, parse_special2/1, parse_negative/1,
   46:          recompose_fragment/1, recompose_parse_fragment/1,
   47:          recompose_query/1, recompose_parse_query/1,
   48:          recompose_path/1, recompose_parse_path/1,
   49:          recompose_autogen/1, parse_recompose_autogen/1,
   50:          resolve_normal_examples/1, resolve_abnormal_examples/1,
   51:          resolve_base_uri/1, resolve_return_map/1,
   52:          transcode_basic/1, transcode_options/1, transcode_mixed/1, transcode_negative/1,
   53:          compose_query/1, compose_query_latin1/1, compose_query_negative/1,
   54:          dissect_query/1, dissect_query_negative/1,
   55:          interop_query_latin1/1, interop_query_utf8/1,
   56:          regression_parse/1, regression_recompose/1, regression_normalize/1,
   57:          recompose_host_relative_path/1,
   58:          recompose_host_absolute_path/1,
   59:          quote/1
   60:         ]).
   61: 
   62: 
   63: -define(SCHEME, "foo").
   64: -define(USERINFO, "åsa").
   65: -define(USERINFO_ENC, "%C3%A5sa").
   66: -define(HOST, "älvsjö").
   67: -define(HOST_ENC, "%C3%A4lvsj%C3%B6").
   68: -define(IPV6, "::127.0.0.1").
   69: -define(IPV6_ENC, "[::127.0.0.1]").
   70: -define(PORT, 8042).
   71: -define(PORT_ENC, ":8042").
   72: -define(PATH, "/där").
   73: -define(PATH_ENC, "/d%C3%A4r").
   74: -define(QUERY, "name=örn").
   75: -define(QUERY_ENC, "?name=%C3%B6rn").
   76: -define(FRAGMENT, "näsa").
   77: -define(FRAGMENT_ENC, "#n%C3%A4sa").
   78: 
   79: 
   80: suite() ->
   81:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   82: 
   83: all() ->
   84:     [
   85:      normalize,
   86:      normalize_map,
   87:      normalize_return_map,
   88:      normalize_negative,
   89:      normalize_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo,
   90:      normalize_binary_pct_encoded_query,
   91:      normalize_binary_pct_encoded_fragment,
   92:      normalize_pct_encoded_userinfo,
   93:      normalize_pct_encoded_query,
   94:      normalize_pct_encoded_fragment,
   95:      normalize_pct_encoded_negative,
   96:      parse_binary_scheme,
   97:      parse_binary_userinfo,
   98:      parse_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo,
   99:      parse_binary_host,

  102:      parse_binary_port,

  109:      parse_userinfo,
  110:      parse_pct_encoded_userinfo,
  111:      parse_host,

  113:      parse_host_ipv6,

  117:      parse_pct_encoded_query,

  125:      parse_special2,

  161: 
  162: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  163: %% Helper functions
  164: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  165: uri_combinations() ->
  166:     [[Sch,Usr,Hst,Prt,Pat,Qry,Frg] ||
  167:         Sch <- [fun update_scheme/1, fun update_scheme_binary/1, none],
  168:         Usr <- [fun update_userinfo/1, fun update_userinfo_binary/1, none],
  169:         Hst <- [fun update_host/1, fun update_host_binary/1,
  170:                 fun update_ipv6/1, fun update_ipv6_binary/1, none],
  171:         Prt <- [fun update_port/1, none],
  172:         Pat <- [fun update_path/1, fun update_path_binary/1],
  173:         Qry <- [fun update_query/1,fun update_query_binary/1, none],
  174:         Frg <- [fun update_fragment/1, fun update_fragment_binary/1, none],
  175:         not (Usr =:= none andalso Hst =:= none andalso Prt =/= none),
  176:         not (Usr =/= none andalso Hst =:= none andalso Prt =:= none),
  177:         not (Usr =/= none andalso Hst =:= none andalso Prt =/= none)].
  178: 
  179: 
  180: generate_test_vector(Comb) ->
  181:     Fun = fun (F, {Map, URI}) when is_function(F) -> F({Map, URI});
  182:               (_, Map) -> Map
  183:           end,
  184:     lists:foldl(Fun, {#{}, empty}, Comb).
  185: 
  186: generate_test_vectors(L) ->
  187:     lists:map(fun generate_test_vector/1, L).
  188: 
  189: update_fragment({In, empty}) ->
  190:     {In#{fragment => ?FRAGMENT}, ?FRAGMENT_ENC};
  191: update_fragment({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  192:     {In#{fragment => ?FRAGMENT}, Out ++ ?FRAGMENT_ENC};
  193: update_fragment({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  194:     {In#{fragment => ?FRAGMENT}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ ?FRAGMENT_ENC}.
  195: 
  196: update_fragment_binary({In, empty}) ->
  197:     {In#{fragment => <<?FRAGMENT/utf8>>}, <<?FRAGMENT_ENC>>};
  198: update_fragment_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  199:     {In#{fragment => <<?FRAGMENT/utf8>>}, Out ++ ?FRAGMENT_ENC};
  200: update_fragment_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  201:     {In#{fragment => <<?FRAGMENT/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,?FRAGMENT_ENC>>}.
  202: 
  203: 
  204: update_query({In, empty}) ->
  205:     {In#{query => ?QUERY}, ?QUERY_ENC};
  206: update_query({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  207:     {In#{query => ?QUERY}, Out ++ ?QUERY_ENC};
  208: update_query({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  209:     {In#{query => ?QUERY}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ ?QUERY_ENC}.
  210: 
  211: update_query_binary({In, empty}) ->
  212:     {In#{query => <<?QUERY/utf8>>}, <<?QUERY_ENC>>};
  213: update_query_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  214:     {In#{query => <<?QUERY/utf8>>}, Out ++ ?QUERY_ENC};
  215: update_query_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  216:     {In#{query => <<?QUERY/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,?QUERY_ENC>>}.
  217: 
  218: update_path({In, empty}) ->
  219:     {In#{path => ?PATH}, ?PATH_ENC};
  220: update_path({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  221:     {In#{path => ?PATH}, Out ++ ?PATH_ENC};
  222: update_path({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  223:     {In#{path => ?PATH}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ ?PATH_ENC}.
  224: 
  225: update_path_binary({In, empty}) ->
  226:     {In#{path => <<?PATH/utf8>>}, <<?PATH_ENC>>};
  227: update_path_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  228:     {In#{path => <<?PATH/utf8>>}, Out ++ ?PATH_ENC};
  229: update_path_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  230:     {In#{path => <<?PATH/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,?PATH_ENC>>}.
  231: 
  232: update_port({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  233:     {In#{port => ?PORT}, Out ++ ?PORT_ENC};
  234: update_port({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  235:     {In#{port => ?PORT}, <<Out/binary,?PORT_ENC>>}.
  236: 
  237: update_host({In, empty}) ->
  238:     {In#{host => ?HOST}, "//" ++ ?HOST_ENC};
  239: update_host({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  240:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  241:         true -> {In#{host => ?HOST}, Out ++ [$@|?HOST_ENC]};
  242:         false -> {In#{host => ?HOST}, Out ++ [$/,$/|?HOST_ENC]}
  243:     end;
  244: update_host({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  245:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  246:         true -> {In#{host => ?HOST}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ [$@|?HOST_ENC]};
  247:         false -> {In#{host => ?HOST}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ [$/,$/|?HOST_ENC]}
  248:     end.
  249: 
  250: update_host_binary({In, empty}) ->
  251:     {In#{host => <<?HOST/utf8>>}, <<"//",?HOST_ENC>>};
  252: update_host_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  253:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  254:         true -> {In#{host => <<?HOST/utf8>>}, Out ++ [$@|?HOST_ENC]};
  255:         false -> {In#{host => <<?HOST/utf8>>}, Out ++ [$/,$/|?HOST_ENC]}
  256:     end;
  257: update_host_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  258:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  259:         true -> {In#{host => <<?HOST/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,$@,?HOST_ENC>>};
  260:         false-> {In#{host => <<?HOST/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,"//",?HOST_ENC>>}
  261:     end.
  262: 
  263: update_ipv6({In, empty}) ->
  264:     {In#{host => ?IPV6}, "//" ++ ?IPV6_ENC};
  265: update_ipv6({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  266:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  267:         true -> {In#{host => ?IPV6}, Out ++ [$@|?IPV6_ENC]};
  268:         false -> {In#{host => ?IPV6}, Out ++ [$/,$/|?IPV6_ENC]}
  269:     end;
  270: update_ipv6({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  271:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  272:         true -> {In#{host => ?IPV6}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ [$@|?IPV6_ENC]};
  273:         false -> {In#{host => ?IPV6}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ [$/,$/|?IPV6_ENC]}
  274:     end.
  275: 
  276: update_ipv6_binary({In, empty}) ->
  277:     {In#{host => <<?IPV6/utf8>>}, <<"//",?IPV6_ENC>>};
  278: update_ipv6_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  279:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  280:         true -> {In#{host => <<?IPV6/utf8>>}, Out ++ [$@|?IPV6_ENC]};
  281:         false -> {In#{host => <<?IPV6/utf8>>}, Out ++ [$/,$/|?IPV6_ENC]}
  282:     end;
  283: update_ipv6_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  284:     case maps:is_key(userinfo, In) of
  285:         true -> {In#{host => <<?IPV6/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,$@,?IPV6_ENC>>};
  286:         false-> {In#{host => <<?IPV6/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,"//",?IPV6_ENC>>}
  287:     end.
  288: 
  289: update_userinfo({In, empty}) ->
  290:     {In#{userinfo => ?USERINFO}, "//" ++ ?USERINFO_ENC};
  291: update_userinfo({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  292:     {In#{userinfo => ?USERINFO}, Out ++ "//" ++ ?USERINFO_ENC};
  293: update_userinfo({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  294:     {In#{userinfo => ?USERINFO}, binary_to_list(Out) ++ "//" ++ ?USERINFO_ENC}.
  295: 
  296: update_userinfo_binary({In, empty}) ->
  297:     {In#{userinfo => <<?USERINFO/utf8>>}, <<"//",?USERINFO_ENC>>};
  298: update_userinfo_binary({In, Out}) when is_list(Out) ->
  299:     {In#{userinfo => <<?USERINFO/utf8>>}, Out ++ "//" ++ ?USERINFO_ENC};
  300: update_userinfo_binary({In, Out}) when is_binary(Out) ->
  301:     {In#{userinfo => <<?USERINFO/utf8>>}, <<Out/binary,"//",?USERINFO_ENC>>}.
  302: 
  303: update_scheme({In, empty}) ->
  304:     {In#{scheme => ?SCHEME}, ?SCHEME ++ ":"}.
  305: 
  306: update_scheme_binary({In, empty}) ->
  307:     {In#{scheme => <<?SCHEME/utf8>>}, <<?SCHEME,$:>>}.
  308: 
  309: 
  310: %% Test recompose on a generated test vector
  311: run_test_recompose({#{}, empty}) ->
  312:     try "" = uri_string:recompose(#{}) of
  313:         _ -> ok
  314:     catch
  315:         _:_ -> error({test_failed, #{}, ""})
  316:     end;
  317: run_test_recompose({Map, URI}) ->
  318:     try URI = uri_string:recompose(Map) of
  319:         URI -> ok
  320:     catch
  321:         _:_ -> error({test_failed, Map, URI})
  322:     end.
  323: 
  324: %% Test parse - recompose on a generated test vector
  325: run_test_parse_recompose({#{}, empty}) ->
  326:     try "" = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("")) of
  327:         _ -> ok
  328:     catch
  329:         _:_ -> error({test_failed, #{}, ""})
  330:     end;
  331: run_test_parse_recompose({Map, URI}) ->
  332:     try URI = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(URI)) of
  333:         URI -> ok
  334:     catch
  335:         _:_ -> error({test_failed, Map, URI})
  336:     end.
  337: 
  338: 
  339: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  340: %% Parse tests
  341: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  342: 
  343: parse_binary_scheme(_Config) ->
  344:     #{} = uri_string:parse(<<>>),
  345:     #{path := <<"foo">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo">>),
  346:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo:">>),
  347:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"bar:nisse">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo:bar:nisse">>),
  348:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo://">>),
  349:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"">>, path := <<"/">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo:///">>),
  350:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"">>, path := <<"//">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo:////">>),
  351: 
  352:     #{path := <<"/">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"/">>),
  353:     #{host := <<>>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//">>),
  354:     #{host := <<>>, path := <<"/">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"///">>).
  355: 
  356: parse_binary_userinfo(_Config) ->
  357:     #{scheme := <<"user">>, path := <<"password@localhost">>} =
  358:         uri_string:parse(<<"user:password@localhost">>),
  359:     #{path := <<"user@">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"user@">>),
  360:     #{path := <<"/user@">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"/user@">>),
  361:     #{path := <<"user@localhost">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"user@localhost">>),
  362:     #{userinfo := <<"user">>, host := <<"localhost">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//user@localhost">>),
  363:     #{userinfo := <<"user:password">>, host := <<"localhost">>} =
  364:         uri_string:parse(<<"//user:password@localhost">>),
  365:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"/user@">>} =
  366:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/user@">>),
  367:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"user">>, host := <<"localhost">>} =
  368:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://user@localhost">>),
  369:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"user:password">>, host := <<"localhost">>} =
  370:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://user:password@localhost">>).
  371: 
  372: parse_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo(_Config) ->
  373:     #{scheme := <<"user">>, path := <<"%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  374:         uri_string:parse(<<"user:%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  375:     #{path := <<"%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>} =
  376:         uri_string:parse(<<"%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>),
  377:     #{path := <<"/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>} =
  378:         uri_string:parse(<<"/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>),
  379:     #{path := <<"%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  380:         uri_string:parse(<<"%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  381:     #{userinfo := <<"%E5%90%88">>, host := <<"%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  382:         uri_string:parse(<<"//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  383:     #{userinfo := <<"%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97">>, host := <<"%E9%81%93">>} =
  384:         uri_string:parse(<<"//%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93">>),
  385:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>} =
  386:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>),
  387:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"%E5%90%88">>, host := <<"%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  388:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  389:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97">>, host := <<"%E9%81%93">>} =
  390:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93">>),
  391:     {error,invalid_uri,"@"} = uri_string:parse(<<"//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>),
  392:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>).
  393: 
  394: parse_binary_host(_Config) ->
  395:     #{host := <<"hostname">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//hostname">>),
  396:     #{host := <<"hostname">>,scheme := <<"foo">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo://hostname">>),
  397:     #{host := <<"hostname">>,scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"user">>} =
  398:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://user@hostname">>).
  399: 
  400: parse_binary_host_ipv4(_Config) ->
  401:     #{host := <<"127.0.0.1">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//127.0.0.1">>),
  402:     #{host := <<"127.0.0.1">>, path := <<"/over/there">>} =
  403:         uri_string:parse(<<"//127.0.0.1/over/there">>),
  404:     #{host := <<"127.0.0.1">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  405:         uri_string:parse(<<"//127.0.0.1?name=ferret">>),
  406:     #{host := <<"127.0.0.1">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//127.0.0.1#nose">>),
  407:     #{host := <<"127.0.0.x">>,path := <<>>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//127.0.0.x">>),
  408:     #{host := <<"1227.0.0.1">>,path := <<>>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//1227.0.0.1">>).
  409: 
  410: parse_binary_host_ipv6(_Config) ->
  411:     #{host := <<"::127.0.0.1">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//[::127.0.0.1]">>),
  412:     #{host := <<"2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:07ab">>} =
  413:         uri_string:parse(<<"//[2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:07ab]">>),
  414:     #{host := <<"::127.0.0.1">>, path := <<"/over/there">>} =
  415:         uri_string:parse(<<"//[::127.0.0.1]/over/there">>),
  416:     #{host := <<"::127.0.0.1">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  417:         uri_string:parse(<<"//[::127.0.0.1]?name=ferret">>),
  418:     #{host := <<"::127.0.0.1">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  419:         uri_string:parse(<<"//[::127.0.0.1]#nose">>),
  420:     {error,invalid_uri,"x"} = uri_string:parse(<<"//[::127.0.0.x]">>),
  421:     {error,invalid_uri,"::1227.0.0.1"} = uri_string:parse(<<"//[::1227.0.0.1]">>),
  422:     {error,invalid_uri,"G"} = uri_string:parse(<<"//[2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:G7ab]">>).
  423: 
  424: parse_binary_port(_Config) ->
  425:     #{path:= <<"/:8042">>} =
  426:         uri_string:parse(<<"/:8042">>),
  427:     #{host:= <<>>, port := 8042} =
  428:         uri_string:parse(<<"//:8042">>),
  429:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, port:= 8042} =
  430:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com:8042">>),
  431:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"/:8042">>} =
  432:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/:8042">>),
  433:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<>>, port := 8042} =
  434:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://:8042">>),
  435:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, port := 8042} =
  436:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com:8042">>),
  437:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} = uri_string:parse(":600"),
  438:     {error,invalid_uri,"x"} = uri_string:parse("//:8042x").
  439: 
  440: parse_binary_path(_Config) ->
  441:     #{path := <<"over/there">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"over/there">>),
  442:     #{path := <<"/over/there">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"/over/there">>),
  443:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"/over/there">>} =
  444:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/over/there">>),
  445:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/over/there">>} =
  446:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com/over/there">>),
  447:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/over/there">>, port := 8042} =
  448:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com:8042/over/there">>).
  449: 
  450: parse_binary_query(_Config) ->
  451:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  452:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:?name=ferret">>),
  453:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path:= <<"over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  454:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:over/there?name=ferret">>),
  455:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path:= <<"/over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  456:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/over/there?name=ferret">>),
  457:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  458:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com?name=ferret">>),
  459:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  460:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com/?name=ferret">>),
  461: 
  462:     #{path := <<>>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  463:         uri_string:parse(<<"?name=ferret">>),
  464:     #{path := <<"over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  465:         uri_string:parse(<<"over/there?name=ferret">>),
  466:     #{path := <<"/">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  467:         uri_string:parse(<<"/?name=ferret">>),
  468:     #{path := <<"/over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  469:         uri_string:parse(<<"/over/there?name=ferret">>),
  470:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  471:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com?name=ferret">>),
  472:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>} =
  473:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com/?name=ferret">>).
  474: 
  475: parse_binary_pct_encoded_query(_Config) ->
  476:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>,
  477:       query := <<"name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  478:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  479:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, query := <<"name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  480:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>).
  481: 
  482: parse_binary_fragment(_Config) ->
  483:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  484:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:#nose">>),
  485:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path:= <<"over/there">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  486:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:over/there#nose">>),
  487:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path:= <<"/over/there">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  488:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo:/over/there#nose">>),
  489:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  490:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com#nose">>),
  491:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  492:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com/#nose">>),
  493:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  494:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com#nose">>),
  495: 
  496:     #{fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  497:         uri_string:parse(<<"#nose">>),
  498:     #{path := <<"over/there">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  499:         uri_string:parse(<<"over/there#nose">>),
  500:     #{path := <<"/">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  501:         uri_string:parse(<<"/#nose">>),
  502:     #{path := <<"/over/there">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  503:         uri_string:parse(<<"/over/there#nose">>),
  504:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  505:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com#nose">>),
  506:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  507:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com/#nose">>).
  508: 
  509: parse_binary_pct_encoded_fragment(_Config) ->
  510:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>,
  511:       fragment := <<"%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  512:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>),
  513:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>,
  514:       fragment := <<"%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>} =
  515:         uri_string:parse(<<"//example.com/#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>).
  516: 
  517: parse_scheme(_Config) ->
  518:     #{} = uri_string:parse(""),
  519:     #{path := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("foo"),
  520:     #{scheme := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("foo:"),
  521:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "bar:nisse"} = uri_string:parse("foo:bar:nisse"),
  522:     #{scheme := "foo", host := ""} = uri_string:parse("foo://"),
  523:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "", path := "/"} = uri_string:parse("foo:///"),
  524:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "", path := "//"} = uri_string:parse("foo:////"),
  525: 
  526:     #{path := "/"} = uri_string:parse("/"),
  527:     #{host := ""} = uri_string:parse("//"),
  528:     #{host := "", path := "/"} = uri_string:parse("///").
  529: 
  530: parse_userinfo(_Config) ->
  531:     #{scheme := "user", path := "password@localhost"} = uri_string:parse("user:password@localhost"),
  532:     #{path := "user@"} = uri_string:parse("user@"),
  533:     #{path := "/user@"} = uri_string:parse("/user@"),
  534:     #{path := "user@localhost"} = uri_string:parse("user@localhost"),
  535:     #{userinfo := "user", host := "localhost"} = uri_string:parse("//user@localhost"),
  536:     #{userinfo := "user:password", host := "localhost"} =
  537:         uri_string:parse("//user:password@localhost"),
  538:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "/user@"} =
  539:         uri_string:parse("foo:/user@"),
  540:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "user", host := "localhost"} =
  541:         uri_string:parse("foo://user@localhost"),
  542:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "user:password", host := "localhost"} =
  543:         uri_string:parse("foo://user:password@localhost").
  544: 
  545: parse_pct_encoded_userinfo(_Config) ->
  546:     #{scheme := "user", path := "%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  547:         uri_string:parse("user:%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  548:     #{path := "%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"} =
  549:         uri_string:parse("%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"),
  550:     #{path := "/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"} =
  551:         uri_string:parse("/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"),
  552:     #{path := "%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  553:         uri_string:parse("%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  554:     #{userinfo := "%E5%90%88", host := "%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  555:         uri_string:parse("//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  556:     #{userinfo := "%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97", host := "%E9%81%93"} =
  557:         uri_string:parse("//%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93"),
  558:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"} =
  559:         uri_string:parse("foo:/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"),
  560:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "%E5%90%88", host := "%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  561:         uri_string:parse("foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  562:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97", host := "%E9%81%93"} =
  563:         uri_string:parse("foo://%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93"),
  564:     {error,invalid_uri,"@"} = uri_string:parse("//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@"),
  565:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} = uri_string:parse("foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@").
  566: 
  567: parse_host(_Config) ->
  568:     #{host := "hostname"} = uri_string:parse("//hostname"),
  569:     #{host := "hostname",scheme := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("foo://hostname"),
  570:     #{host := "hostname",scheme := "foo", userinfo := "user"} =
  571:         uri_string:parse("foo://user@hostname").
  572: 
  573: parse_host_ipv4(_Config) ->
  574:     #{host := "127.0.0.1"} = uri_string:parse("//127.0.0.1"),
  575:     #{host := "2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:07ab"} =
  576:         uri_string:parse("//[2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:07ab]"),
  577:     #{host := "127.0.0.1", path := "/over/there"} = uri_string:parse("//127.0.0.1/over/there"),
  578:     #{host := "127.0.0.1", query := "name=ferret"} = uri_string:parse("//127.0.0.1?name=ferret"),
  579:     #{host := "127.0.0.1", fragment := "nose"} = uri_string:parse("//127.0.0.1#nose"),
  580:     #{host := "127.0.0.x",path := []} = uri_string:parse("//127.0.0.x"),
  581:     #{host := "1227.0.0.1",path := []} = uri_string:parse("//1227.0.0.1").
  582: 
  583: parse_host_ipv6(_Config) ->
  584:     #{host := "::127.0.0.1"} = uri_string:parse("//[::127.0.0.1]"),
  585:     #{host := "::127.0.0.1", path := "/over/there"} = uri_string:parse("//[::127.0.0.1]/over/there"),
  586:     #{host := "::127.0.0.1", query := "name=ferret"} =
  587:         uri_string:parse("//[::127.0.0.1]?name=ferret"),
  588:     #{host := "::127.0.0.1", fragment := "nose"} = uri_string:parse("//[::127.0.0.1]#nose"),
  589:     {error,invalid_uri,"x"} = uri_string:parse("//[::127.0.0.x]"),
  590:     {error,invalid_uri,"::1227.0.0.1"} = uri_string:parse("//[::1227.0.0.1]"),
  591:     {error,invalid_uri,"G"} = uri_string:parse("//[2001:0db8:0000:0000:0000:0000:1428:G7ab]").
  592: 
  593: parse_port(_Config) ->
  594:     parse_port_with_param("8042", 8042),
  595:     parse_port_with_param("", undefined).
  596: 
  597: parse_port_with_param(PortString, Expected) ->
  598:     #{path:= "/:" ++ PortString} =
  599:         uri_string:parse("/:" ++ PortString),
  600:     #{host:= "", port := Expected} =
  601:         uri_string:parse("//:" ++ PortString),
  602:     #{host := "example.com", port:= Expected} =
  603:         uri_string:parse("//example.com:" ++ PortString),
  604:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "/:" ++ PortString} =
  605:         uri_string:parse("foo:/:" ++ PortString),
  606:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "", port := Expected} =
  607:         uri_string:parse("foo://:" ++ PortString),
  608:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", port := Expected} =
  609:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com:" ++ PortString).
  610: 
  611: parse_path(_Config) ->
  612:     #{path := "over/there"} = uri_string:parse("over/there"),
  613:     #{path := "/over/there"} = uri_string:parse("/over/there"),
  614:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "/over/there"} =
  615:         uri_string:parse("foo:/over/there"),
  616:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/over/there"} =
  617:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com/over/there"),
  618:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/over/there", port := 8042} =
  619:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com:8042/over/there").
  620: 
  621: parse_query(_Config) ->
  622:     #{scheme := "foo", query := "name=ferret"} =
  623:         uri_string:parse("foo:?name=ferret"),
  624:     #{scheme := "foo", path:= "over/there", query := "name=ferret"} =
  625:         uri_string:parse("foo:over/there?name=ferret"),
  626:     #{scheme := "foo", path:= "/over/there", query := "name=ferret"} =
  627:         uri_string:parse("foo:/over/there?name=ferret"),
  628:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", query := "name=ferret"} =
  629:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com?name=ferret"),
  630:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/", query := "name=ferret"} =
  631:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com/?name=ferret"),
  632: 
  633:     #{path := "", query := "name=ferret"} =
  634:         uri_string:parse("?name=ferret"),
  635:     #{path := "over/there", query := "name=ferret"} =
  636:         uri_string:parse("over/there?name=ferret"),
  637:     #{path := "/", query := "name=ferret"} =
  638:         uri_string:parse("/?name=ferret"),
  639:     #{path := "/over/there", query := "name=ferret"} =
  640:         uri_string:parse("/over/there?name=ferret"),
  641:     #{host := "example.com", query := "name=ferret"} =
  642:         uri_string:parse("//example.com?name=ferret"),
  643:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/", query := "name=ferret"} =
  644:         uri_string:parse("//example.com/?name=ferret").
  645: 
  646: parse_pct_encoded_query(_Config) ->
  647:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/",
  648:       query := "name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  649:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  650:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/", query := "name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  651:         uri_string:parse("//example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93").
  652: 
  653: parse_fragment(_Config) ->
  654:     #{scheme := "foo", fragment := "nose"} =
  655:         uri_string:parse("foo:#nose"),
  656:     #{scheme := "foo", path:= "over/there", fragment := "nose"} =
  657:         uri_string:parse("foo:over/there#nose"),
  658:     #{scheme := "foo", path:= "/over/there", fragment := "nose"} =
  659:         uri_string:parse("foo:/over/there#nose"),
  660:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", fragment := "nose"} =
  661:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com#nose"),
  662:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/", fragment := "nose"} =
  663:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com/#nose"),
  664:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", fragment := "nose"} =
  665:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com#nose"),
  666: 
  667:     #{fragment := "nose"} =
  668:         uri_string:parse("#nose"),
  669:     #{path := "over/there", fragment := "nose"} =
  670:         uri_string:parse("over/there#nose"),
  671:     #{path := "/", fragment := "nose"} =
  672:         uri_string:parse("/#nose"),
  673:     #{path := "/over/there", fragment := "nose"} =
  674:         uri_string:parse("/over/there#nose"),
  675:     #{host := "example.com", fragment := "nose"} =
  676:         uri_string:parse("//example.com#nose"),
  677:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/", fragment := "nose"} =
  678:         uri_string:parse("//example.com/#nose").
  679: 
  680: parse_pct_encoded_fragment(_Config) ->
  681:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com",
  682:       fragment := "%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  683:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"),
  684:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/",
  685:       fragment := "%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93"} =
  686:         uri_string:parse("//example.com/#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93").
  687: 
  688: parse_list(_Config) ->
  689:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "bar:nisse"} = uri_string:parse("foo:bar:nisse"),
  690:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", port := 8042,
  691:       path := "/over/there", query := "name=ferret", fragment := "nose"} =
  692:         uri_string:parse("foo://example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose"),
  693:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "admin:admin", host := "example.com", port := 8042,
  694:       path := "/over/there", query := "name=ferret", fragment := "nose"} =
  695:         uri_string:parse("foo://admin:admin@example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose").
  696: 
  697: parse_binary(_Config) ->
  698:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"bar:nisse">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"foo:bar:nisse">>),
  699:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, port := 8042,
  700:       path := <<"/over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  701:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose">>),
  702:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"admin:admin">>, host := <<"example.com">>, port := 8042,
  703:       path := <<"/over/there">>, query := <<"name=ferret">>, fragment := <<"nose">>} =
  704:         uri_string:parse(<<"foo://admin:admin@example.com:8042/over/there?name=ferret#nose">>).
  705: 
  706: 
  707: parse_mixed(_Config) ->
  708:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "bar"} =
  709:         uri_string:parse(lists:append("fo",<<"o:bar">>)),
  710:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "bar"} =
  711:         uri_string:parse(lists:append("foo:b",<<"ar">>)),
  712:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "bar:bar"} =
  713:         uri_string:parse([[102],[111,111],<<":bar">>,58,98,97,114]).
  714: 
  715: parse_relative(_Config) ->
  716:     #{path := "/path"} =
  717:         uri_string:parse(lists:append("/pa",<<"th">>)),
  718:     #{path := "foo"} =
  719:         uri_string:parse(lists:append("fo",<<"o">>)).
  720: 
  721: parse_special(_Config) ->
  722:     #{host := [],query := []} = uri_string:parse("//?"),
  723:     #{fragment := [],host := []} = uri_string:parse("//#"),
  724:     #{host := [],query := [],scheme := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("foo://?"),
  725:     #{fragment := [],host := [],scheme := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("foo://#"),
  726:     #{host := <<>>, path := <<"/">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"///">>),
  727:     #{host := <<"hostname">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"//hostname">>),
  728:     #{host := <<>>, path := <<"/hostname">>} = uri_string:parse(<<"///hostname">>),
  729:     #{host :=  [],path := "/",query := []} = uri_string:parse("///?"),
  730:     #{fragment := [],host := [],path := "/"} = uri_string:parse("///#"),
  731:     #{host := "foo",query := []} = uri_string:parse("//foo?"),
  732:     #{fragment := [],host := "foo"} = uri_string:parse("//foo#"),
  733:     #{host := "foo",path := "/"} = uri_string:parse("//foo/"),
  734:     #{host := "foo",query := [],scheme := "http"} = uri_string:parse("http://foo?"),
  735:     #{fragment := [],host := "foo",scheme := "http"} = uri_string:parse("http://foo#"),
  736:     #{host := "foo",path := "/",scheme := "http"} = uri_string:parse("http://foo/"),
  737:     #{fragment := [],host := "host",port := 80,scheme := "http"} = uri_string:parse("http://host:80#"),
  738:     #{host := "host",port := 80,query := [],scheme := "http"} = uri_string:parse("http://host:80?"),
  739:     #{path := [],query := []} = uri_string:parse("?"),
  740:     #{path := [],query := "?"} = uri_string:parse("??"),
  741:     #{path := [],query := "??"} = uri_string:parse("???").
  742: 
  743: parse_special2(_Config) ->
  744:     #{host := [],path := "/",port := 1,scheme := "a"} = uri_string:parse("a://:1/"),
  745:     #{path := "/a/",scheme := "a"} = uri_string:parse("a:/a/"),
  746:     #{host := [],path := [],userinfo := []} = uri_string:parse("//@"),
  747:     #{host := [],path := [],scheme := "foo",userinfo := []} = uri_string:parse("foo://@"),
  748:     #{host := [],path := "/",userinfo := []} = uri_string:parse("//@/"),
  749:     #{host := [],path := "/",scheme := "foo",userinfo := []} = uri_string:parse("foo://@/"),
  750:     #{host := "localhost",path := "/",port := undefined} = uri_string:parse("//localhost:/"),
  751:     #{host := [],path := [],port := undefined} = uri_string:parse("//:").
  752: 
  753: parse_negative(_Config) ->
  754:     {error,invalid_uri,"å"} = uri_string:parse("å"),
  755:     {error,invalid_uri,"å"} = uri_string:parse("aå:/foo"),
  756:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} = uri_string:parse("foo://usär@host"),
  757:     {error,invalid_uri,"ö"} = uri_string:parse("//host/path?foö=bar"),
  758:     {error,invalid_uri,"ö"} = uri_string:parse("//host/path#foö"),
  759:     {error,invalid_uri,":::127.0.0.1"} = uri_string:parse("//[:::127.0.0.1]"),
  760:     {error,invalid_uri,"A"} = uri_string:parse("//localhost:A8").
  761: 
  762: 
  763: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  764: %% Recompose tests
  765: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  766: recompose_fragment(_Config) ->
  767:     <<?FRAGMENT_ENC>> = uri_string:recompose(#{fragment => <<?FRAGMENT/utf8>>, path => <<>>}),
  768:     ?FRAGMENT_ENC = uri_string:recompose(#{fragment => ?FRAGMENT, path => ""}).
  769: 
  770: recompose_parse_fragment(_Config) ->
  771:     <<?FRAGMENT_ENC>> = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<?FRAGMENT_ENC>>)),
  772:     ?FRAGMENT_ENC = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(?FRAGMENT_ENC)).
  773: 
  774: recompose_query(_Config) ->
  775:     <<?QUERY_ENC>> =
  776:         uri_string:recompose(#{query => <<?QUERY/utf8>>, path => <<>>}),
  777:     <<?QUERY_ENC?FRAGMENT_ENC>> =
  778:         uri_string:recompose(#{query => <<?QUERY/utf8>>,
  779:                                fragment => <<?FRAGMENT/utf8>>,
  780:                                path => <<>>}),
  781:     "?name=%C3%B6rn" =
  782:         uri_string:recompose(#{query => "name=örn", path => ""}),
  783:     "?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa" =
  784:         uri_string:recompose(#{query => "name=örn",
  785:                                fragment => "näsa",
  786:                                path => ""}).
  787: 
  788: recompose_parse_query(_Config) ->
  789:     <<"?name=%C3%B6rn">> = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<"?name=%C3%B6rn">>)),
  790:     <<"?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa">> =
  791:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<"?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa">>)),
  792:     "?name=%C3%B6rn" = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("?name=%C3%B6rn")),
  793:     "?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa" = uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa")).
  794: 
  795: recompose_path(_Config) ->
  796:     <<"/d%C3%A4r">> =
  797:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => <<"/där"/utf8>>}),
  798:     <<"/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa">> =
  799:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => <<"/där"/utf8>>,
  800:                                fragment => <<"näsa"/utf8>>}),
  801:     <<"/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn">> =
  802:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => <<"/där"/utf8>>,
  803:                                query => <<"name=örn"/utf8>>}),
  804:     <<"/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa">> =
  805:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => <<"/där"/utf8>>,
  806:                                query => <<"name=örn"/utf8>>,
  807:                                fragment => <<"näsa"/utf8>>}),
  808: 
  809: 
  810:     "/d%C3%A4r" =
  811:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/där"}),
  812:     "/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa" =
  813:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/där",
  814:                                fragment => "näsa"}),
  815:     "/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn" =
  816:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/där",
  817:                                query => "name=örn"}),
  818:     "/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn#n%C3%A4sa" =
  819:         uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/där",
  820:                                query => "name=örn",
  821:                                fragment => "näsa"}).
  822: 
  823: 
  824: recompose_parse_path(_Config) ->
  825:     <<"/d%C3%A4r">> =
  826:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<"/d%C3%A4r">>)),
  827:     <<"/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa">> =
  828:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<"/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa">>)),
  829:     <<"/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn">> =
  830:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse(<<"/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn">>)),
  831: 
  832:     "/d%C3%A4r" =
  833:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("/d%C3%A4r")),
  834:     "/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa" =
  835:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("/d%C3%A4r#n%C3%A4sa")),
  836:     "/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn" =
  837:         uri_string:recompose(uri_string:parse("/d%C3%A4r?name=%C3%B6rn")).
  838: 
  839: 
  840: recompose_autogen(_Config) ->
  841:     Tests = generate_test_vectors(uri_combinations()),
  842:     lists:map(fun run_test_recompose/1, Tests).
  843: 
  844: parse_recompose_autogen(_Config) ->
  845:     Tests = generate_test_vectors(uri_combinations()),
  846:     lists:map(fun run_test_parse_recompose/1, Tests).
  847: 
  848: resolve_normal_examples(_Config) ->
  849:     BaseURI = <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?q">>,
  850:     <<"g:h">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g:h">>, BaseURI),
  851:     <<"http://a/b/c/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g">>, BaseURI),
  852:     <<"http://a/b/c/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"./g">>, BaseURI),
  853:     <<"http://a/b/c/g/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g/">>, BaseURI),
  854:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"/g">>, BaseURI),
  855:     <<"http://g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"//g">>, BaseURI),
  856:     <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?y">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"?y">>, BaseURI),
  857:     <<"http://a/b/c/g?y">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g?y">>, BaseURI),
  858:     <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?q#s">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"#s">>, BaseURI),
  859:     <<"http://a/b/c/g#s">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g#s">>, BaseURI),
  860:     <<"http://a/b/c/g?y#s">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g?y#s">>, BaseURI),
  861:     <<"http://a/b/c/;x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<";x">>, BaseURI),
  862:     <<"http://a/b/c/g;x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g;x">>, BaseURI),
  863:     <<"http://a/b/c/g;x?y#s">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g;x?y#s">>, BaseURI),
  864:     <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?q">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"">>, BaseURI),
  865:     <<"http://a/b/c/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<".">>, BaseURI),
  866:     <<"http://a/b/c/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"./">>, BaseURI),
  867:     <<"http://a/b/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"..">>, BaseURI),
  868:     <<"http://a/b/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../">>, BaseURI),
  869:     <<"http://a/b/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../g">>, BaseURI),
  870:     <<"http://a/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../..">>, BaseURI),
  871:     <<"http://a/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../../">>, BaseURI),
  872:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../../g">>, BaseURI).
  873: 
  874: resolve_abnormal_examples(_Config) ->
  875:     BaseURI = <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?q">>,
  876:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../../../g">>, BaseURI),
  877:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"../../../../g">>, BaseURI),
  878:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"/./g">>, BaseURI),
  879:     <<"http://a/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"/../g">>, BaseURI),
  880:     <<"http://a/b/c/g.">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g.">>, BaseURI),
  881:     <<"http://a/b/c/.g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<".g">>, BaseURI),
  882:     <<"http://a/b/c/g..">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g..">>, BaseURI),
  883:     <<"http://a/b/c/..g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"..g">>, BaseURI),
  884:     <<"http://a/b/g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"./../g">>, BaseURI),
  885:     <<"http://a/b/c/g/">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"./g/.">>, BaseURI),
  886:     <<"http://a/b/c/g/h">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g/./h">>, BaseURI),
  887:     <<"http://a/b/c/h">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g/../h">>, BaseURI),
  888:     <<"http://a/b/c/g;x=1/y">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g;x=1/./y">>, BaseURI),
  889:     <<"http://a/b/c/y">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g;x=1/../y">>, BaseURI),
  890:     <<"http://a/b/c/g?y/./x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g?y/./x">>, BaseURI),
  891:     <<"http://a/b/c/g?y/../x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g?y/../x">>, BaseURI),
  892:     <<"http://a/b/c/g#s/./x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g#s/./x">>, BaseURI),
  893:     <<"http://a/b/c/g#s/../x">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"g#s/../x">>, BaseURI),
  894:     <<"http:g">> = uri_string:resolve(<<"http:g">>, BaseURI). %% for strict parsers
  895: 
  896: resolve_base_uri(_Config) ->
  897:     %% The scheme is required (RFC3986 5.2.1).
  898:     {error,invalid_scheme,""} = uri_string:resolve("g", #{}),
  899:     {error,invalid_scheme,""} = uri_string:resolve("g", "/b/c/d"),
  900:     "foo:g" = uri_string:resolve("g", "foo:"),
  901:     "foo://a/g" = uri_string:resolve("g", "foo://a"),
  902:     "foo:/g" = uri_string:resolve("g", "foo:/a"),
  903:     "foo://a/b/c/g" = uri_string:resolve("g", "foo://a/b/c/d;p?y#f").
  904: 
  905: resolve_return_map(_Config) ->
  906:     BaseURI = <<"http://a/b/c/d;p?q">>,
  907:     #{scheme := <<"http">>,host := <<"a">>,path := <<"/b/c/g">>} =
  908:         uri_string:resolve(<<"g">>, BaseURI, [return_map]).
  909: 
  910: transcode_basic(_Config) ->
  911:     <<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>> =
  912:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%00%00%00%F6bar"/utf32>>, [{in_encoding, utf32},{out_encoding, utf8}]),
  913:     "foo%C3%B6bar" =
  914:         uri_string:transcode("foo%00%00%00%F6bar", [{in_encoding, utf32},{out_encoding, utf8}]),
  915:     <<"foo%00%00%00%F6bar"/utf32>> =
  916:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>>, [{in_encoding, utf8},{out_encoding, utf32}]),
  917:     "foo%00%00%00%F6bar" =
  918:         uri_string:transcode("foo%C3%B6bar", [{in_encoding, utf8},{out_encoding, utf32}]),
  919:     "foo%C3%B6bar" =
  920:         uri_string:transcode("foo%F6bar", [{in_encoding, latin1},{out_encoding, utf8}]).
  921: 
  922: transcode_options(_Config) ->
  923:     <<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>> =
  924:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>>, []),
  925:     <<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>> =
  926:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%00%00%00%F6bar"/utf32>>, [{in_encoding, utf32}]),
  927:     <<"foo%00%00%00%F6bar"/utf32>> =
  928:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%C3%B6bar"/utf8>>, [{out_encoding, utf32}]).
  929: 
  930: transcode_mixed(_Config) ->
  931:     "foo%00%00%00%F6bar" =
  932:         uri_string:transcode(["foo",<<"%C3%B6"/utf8>>,<<"ba"/utf8>>,"r"], [{out_encoding, utf32}]),
  933:     "foo%00%00%00%F6bar" =
  934:         uri_string:transcode(["foo",<<"%C3%"/utf8>>,<<"B6ba"/utf8>>,"r"], [{out_encoding, utf32}]),
  935:     "foo%C3%B6bar" =
  936:         uri_string:transcode(["foo%00", <<"%00%0"/utf32>>,<<"0%F"/utf32>>,"6bar"], [{in_encoding, utf32},{out_encoding, utf8}]).
  937: 
  938: transcode_negative(_Config) ->
  939:     {error,invalid_percent_encoding,"%BXbar"} =
  940:         uri_string:transcode(<<"foo%C3%BXbar"/utf8>>, [{in_encoding, utf8},{out_encoding, utf32}]),
  941:     {error,invalid_input,<<"ö">>} =
  942:         uri_string:transcode("foo%F6bar", [{in_encoding, utf8},{out_encoding, utf8}]).
  943: 
  944: compose_query(_Config) ->
  945:     [] = uri_string:compose_query([]),
  946:     "foo=1&bar=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{<<"foo">>,"1"}, {"bar", "2"}]),
  947:     "foo=1&bar" = uri_string:compose_query([{<<"foo">>,"1"}, {"bar", true}]),
  948:     "foo=1&b%C3%A4r=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo","1"}, {"bär", "2"}],[{encoding,utf8}]),
  949:     "foo=1&b%C3%A4r=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo","1"}, {"bär", "2"}],[{encoding,unicode}]),
  950:     "foo=1&b%E4r=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo","1"}, {"bär", "2"}],[{encoding,latin1}]),
  951:     "foo&b%E4r=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo",true}, {"bär", "2"}],[{encoding,latin1}]),
  952:     "foo+bar=1&%E5%90%88=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}]),
  953:     "foo+bar=1&%26%2321512%3B=2" =
  954:         uri_string:compose_query([{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}],[{encoding,latin1}]),
  955:     "foo+bar=1&%C3%B6=2" = uri_string:compose_query([{<<"foo bar">>,<<"1">>}, {"ö", <<"2">>}]),
  956:     <<"foo+bar=1&%C3%B6=2">> =
  957:         uri_string:compose_query([{<<"foo bar">>,<<"1">>}, {<<"ö"/utf8>>, <<"2">>}]).
  958: 
  959: compose_query_latin1(_Config) ->
  960:     Q = uri_string:compose_query([{"合foö bar","1"}, {"合", "合"}],[{encoding,latin1}]),
  961:     Q1 = uri_string:transcode(Q, [{in_encoding, latin1}]),
  962:     [{"合foö bar","1"}, {"合", "合"}] = uri_string:dissect_query(Q1),
  963:     Q2 = uri_string:compose_query([{<<"合foö bar"/utf8>>,<<"1">>}, {<<"合"/utf8>>, <<"合"/utf8>>}],
  964:                                   [{encoding,latin1}]),
  965:     Q3 = uri_string:transcode(Q2, [{in_encoding, latin1}]),
  966:     [{<<"合foö bar"/utf8>>,<<"1">>}, {<<"合"/utf8>>, <<"合"/utf8>>}] =
  967:         uri_string:dissect_query(Q3).
  968: 
  969: compose_query_negative(_Config) ->
  970:     {error,invalid_input,4} = uri_string:compose_query([{"",4}]),
  971:     {error,invalid_input,5} = uri_string:compose_query([{5,""}]),
  972:     {error,invalid_encoding,utf16} =
  973:         uri_string:compose_query([{"foo bar","1"}, {<<"ö">>, "2"}],[{encoding,utf16}]).
  974: 
  975: dissect_query(_Config) ->
  976:     [] = uri_string:dissect_query(""),
  977:     [{"foo","1"}, {"amp;bar", "2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query("foo=1&amp;bar=2"),
  978:     [{"foo","1"}, {"bar", "2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query("foo=1&bar=2"),
  979:     [{"foo","1;bar=2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query("foo=1;bar=2"),
  980:     [{"foo","1"}, {"bar", "222"}] = uri_string:dissect_query([<<"foo=1&bar=2">>,"22"]),
  981:     [{"foo","ö"}, {"bar", "2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query("foo=%C3%B6&bar=2"),
  982:     [{<<"foo">>,<<"ö"/utf8>>}, {<<"bar">>, <<"2">>}] =
  983:         uri_string:dissect_query(<<"foo=%C3%B6&bar=2">>),
  984:     [{"foo bar","1"},{"ö","2"}] =
  985:         uri_string:dissect_query([<<"foo+bar=1&">>,<<"%C3%B6=2">>]),
  986:     [{"foo bar","1"},{[21512],"2"}] =
  987:         uri_string:dissect_query("foo+bar=1&%26%2321512%3B=2"),
  988:     [{<<"foo bar">>,<<"1">>},{<<"合"/utf8>>,<<"2">>}] =
  989:         uri_string:dissect_query(<<"foo+bar=1&%26%2321512%3B=2">>),
  990:     [{"föo bar","1"},{"ö","2"}] =
  991:         uri_string:dissect_query("föo+bar=1&%C3%B6=2"),
  992:     [{<<"föo bar"/utf8>>,<<"1">>},{<<"ö"/utf8>>,<<"2">>}] =
  993:         uri_string:dissect_query(<<"föo+bar=1&%C3%B6=2"/utf8>>),
  994:     [{"foo1",true},{"bar","2"}] =
  995:         uri_string:dissect_query("foo1&bar=2"),
  996:     [{<<"foo1">>,<<"1">>},{<<"bar">>,true}] =
  997:         uri_string:dissect_query(<<"foo1=1&bar">>).
  998: 
  999: dissect_query_negative(_Config) ->
 1000:     {error,invalid_percent_encoding,"%XX%B6"} = uri_string:dissect_query("foo=%XX%B6&amp;bar=2"),
 1001:     {error,invalid_input,[153]} =
 1002:         uri_string:dissect_query("foo=%99%B6&amp;bar=2"),
 1003:     {error,invalid_character,"ö"} = uri_string:dissect_query(<<"föo+bar=1&%C3%B6=2">>),
 1004:     {error,invalid_input,<<"ö">>} =
 1005:         uri_string:dissect_query([<<"foo+bar=1&amp;">>,<<"%C3%B6=2ö">>]).
 1006: 
 1007: normalize(_Config) ->
 1008:     "/a/g" = uri_string:normalize("/a/b/c/./../../g"),
 1009:     <<"mid/6">> = uri_string:normalize(<<"mid/content=5/../6">>),
 1010:     "http://localhost-%C3%B6rebro/a/g" =
 1011:         uri_string:normalize("http://localhos%74-%c3%b6rebro:80/a/b/c/./../../g"),
 1012:     <<"http://localhost-%C3%B6rebro/a/g">> =
 1013:         uri_string:normalize(<<"http://localhos%74-%c3%b6rebro:80/a/b/c/./../../g">>),
 1014:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1015:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost:443">>),
 1016:     <<"https://localhost:445/">> =
 1017:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost:445">>),
 1018:     <<"ftp://localhost">> =
 1019:         uri_string:normalize(<<"ftp://localhost:21">>),
 1020:     <<"ssh://localhost">> =
 1021:         uri_string:normalize(<<"ssh://localhost:22">>),
 1022:     <<"sftp://localhost">> =
 1023:         uri_string:normalize(<<"sftp://localhost:22">>),
 1024:     <<"tftp://localhost">> =
 1025:         uri_string:normalize(<<"tftp://localhost:69">>),
 1026:     <<"/foo/%2F/bar">> =
 1027:         uri_string:normalize(<<"/foo/%2f/%62ar">>),
 1028:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1029:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost">>),
 1030:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1031:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost/">>),
 1032:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1033:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost:/">>),
 1034:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1035:         uri_string:normalize(<<"https://localhost:">>),
 1036:     <<"yeti://localhost/">> =
 1037:         uri_string:normalize(<<"yeti://localhost:/">>),
 1038:     <<"yeti://localhost">> =
 1039:         uri_string:normalize(<<"yeti://localhost:">>).
 1040: 
 1041: normalize_map(_Config) ->
 1042:     "/a/g" = uri_string:normalize(#{path => "/a/b/c/./../../g"}),
 1043:     <<"mid/6">> = uri_string:normalize(#{path => <<"mid/content=5/../6">>}),
 1044:     "http://localhost-%C3%B6rebro/a/g" =
 1045:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => "http",port => 80,path => "/a/b/c/./../../g",
 1046:                                host => "localhost-örebro"}),
 1047:     <<"http://localhost-%C3%B6rebro/a/g">> =
 1048:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"http">>,port => 80,
 1049:                                path => <<"/a/b/c/./../../g">>,
 1050:                                host => <<"localhost-örebro"/utf8>>}),
 1051:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1052:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"https">>,port => 443,path => <<>>,
 1053:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1054:     <<"https://localhost:445/">> =
 1055:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"https">>,port => 445,path => <<>>,
 1056:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1057:     <<"ftp://localhost">> =
 1058:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"ftp">>,port => 21,path => <<>>,
 1059:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1060:     <<"ssh://localhost">> =
 1061:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"ssh">>,port => 22,path => <<>>,
 1062:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1063:     <<"sftp://localhost">> =
 1064:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"sftp">>,port => 22,path => <<>>,
 1065:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1066:     <<"tftp://localhost">> =
 1067:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"tftp">>,port => 69,path => <<>>,
 1068:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1069:     "/foo/%2F/bar" =
 1070:         uri_string:normalize(#{path => "/foo/%2f/%62ar"}),
 1071:     <<"https://localhost/">> =
 1072:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"https">>,port => undefined,path => <<>>,
 1073:                                host => <<"localhost">>}),
 1074:     <<"yeti://localhost">> =
 1075:         uri_string:normalize(#{scheme => <<"yeti">>,port => undefined,path => <<>>,
 1076:                                host => <<"localhost">>}).
 1077: 
 1078: normalize_return_map(_Config) ->
 1079:     #{scheme := "http",path := "/a/g",host := "localhost-örebro"} =
 1080:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1081:           uri_string:normalize(
 1082:             "http://localhos%74-%c3%b6rebro:80/a/b/c/./../../g",
 1083:             [return_map])),
 1084:     #{scheme := <<"http">>,path := <<"/a/g">>, host := <<"localhost-örebro"/utf8>>} =
 1085:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1086:           uri_string:normalize(
 1087:             <<"http://localhos%74-%c3%b6rebro:80/a/b/c/./../../g">>,
 1088:             [return_map])),
 1089:     #{scheme := <<"https">>,path := <<"/">>, host := <<"localhost">>} =
 1090:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1091:           uri_string:normalize(
 1092:             #{scheme => <<"https">>,port => 443,path => <<>>,
 1093:               host => <<"localhost">>}, [return_map])).
 1094: 
 1095: normalize_negative(_Config) ->
 1096:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1097:         uri_string:normalize("http://local>host"),
 1098:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1099:         uri_string:normalize(<<"http://local>host">>),
 1100:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1101:         uri_string:normalize("http://[192.168.0.1]", [return_map]),
 1102:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1103:         uri_string:normalize(<<"http://[192.168.0.1]">>, [return_map]),
 1104:     {error,invalid_utf8,<<47,47,0,0,0,246>>} =
 1105:         uri_string:percent_decode(uri_string:normalize("//%00%00%00%F6")).
 1106: 
 1107: normalize_binary_pct_encoded_userinfo(_Config) ->
 1108:     #{scheme := <<"user">>, path := <<"合@気道"/utf8>>} =
 1109:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1110:           uri_string:normalize(
 1111:             <<"user:%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1112:     #{path := <<"合気道@"/utf8>>} =
 1113:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1114:           uri_string:normalize(
 1115:             <<"%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>, [return_map])),
 1116:     #{path := <<"/合気道@"/utf8>>} =
 1117:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1118:           uri_string:normalize(
 1119:             <<"/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>, [return_map])),
 1120:     #{path := <<"合@気道"/utf8>>} =
 1121:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1122:           uri_string:normalize(
 1123:             <<"%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1124:     #{userinfo := <<"合"/utf8>>, host := <<"気道"/utf8>>} =
 1125:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1126:           uri_string:normalize(
 1127:             <<"//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1128:     #{userinfo := <<"合:気"/utf8>>, host := <<"道"/utf8>>} =
 1129:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1130:           uri_string:normalize(
 1131:             <<"//%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1132:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, path := <<"/合気道@"/utf8>>} =
 1133:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1134:           uri_string:normalize(
 1135:             <<"foo:/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>, [return_map])),
 1136:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"合"/utf8>>, host := <<"気道"/utf8>>} =
 1137:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1138:           uri_string:normalize(
 1139:             <<"foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1140:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, userinfo := <<"合:気"/utf8>>, host := <<"道"/utf8>>} =
 1141:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1142:           uri_string:normalize(
 1143:             <<"foo://%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1144:     {error,invalid_uri,"@"} =
 1145:           uri_string:normalize(
 1146:             <<"//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>, [return_map]),
 1147:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1148:           uri_string:normalize(
 1149:             <<"foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@">>, [return_map]).
 1150: 
 1151: normalize_binary_pct_encoded_query(_Config) ->
 1152:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>,
 1153:       query := <<"name=合気道"/utf8>>} =
 1154:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1155:           uri_string:normalize(
 1156:             <<"foo://example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>,
 1157:             [return_map])),
 1158:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, query := <<"name=合気道"/utf8>>} =
 1159:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1160:           uri_string:normalize(
 1161:             <<"//example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])).
 1162: 
 1163: normalize_binary_pct_encoded_fragment(_Config) ->
 1164:     #{scheme := <<"foo">>, host := <<"example.com">>, fragment := <<"合気道"/utf8>>} =
 1165:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1166:           uri_string:normalize(
 1167:             <<"foo://example.com#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])),
 1168:     #{host := <<"example.com">>, path := <<"/">>, fragment := <<"合気道"/utf8>>} =
 1169:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1170:           uri_string:normalize(
 1171:             <<"//example.com/#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93">>, [return_map])).
 1172: 
 1173: normalize_pct_encoded_userinfo(_Config) ->
 1174:     #{scheme := "user", path := "合@気道"} =
 1175:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1176:           uri_string:normalize("user:%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1177:     #{path := "合気道@"} =
 1178:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1179:           uri_string:normalize("%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@", [return_map])),
 1180:     #{path := "/合気道@"} =
 1181:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1182:           uri_string:normalize("/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@", [return_map])),
 1183:     #{path := "合@気道"} =
 1184:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1185:           uri_string:normalize("%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1186:     #{userinfo := "合", host := "気道"} =
 1187:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1188:           uri_string:normalize("//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1189:     #{userinfo := "合:気", host := "道"} =
 1190:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1191:           uri_string:normalize("//%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1192:     #{scheme := "foo", path := "/合気道@"} =
 1193:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1194:           uri_string:normalize("foo:/%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@", [return_map])),
 1195:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "合", host := "気道"} =
 1196:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1197:           uri_string:normalize("foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1198:     #{scheme := "foo", userinfo := "合:気", host := "道"} =
 1199:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1200:           uri_string:normalize("foo://%E5%90%88:%E6%B0%97@%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1201:     {error,invalid_uri,"@"} =
 1202:         uri_string:normalize("//%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@", [return_map]),
 1203:     {error,invalid_uri,":"} =
 1204:         uri_string:normalize("foo://%E5%90%88@%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93@", [return_map]).
 1205: 
 1206: normalize_pct_encoded_query(_Config) ->
 1207:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", path := "/",
 1208:       query := "name=合気道"} =
 1209:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1210:           uri_string:normalize(
 1211:             "foo://example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1212:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/", query := "name=合気道"} =
 1213:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1214:           uri_string:normalize(
 1215:             "//example.com/?name=%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])).
 1216: 
 1217: normalize_pct_encoded_fragment(_Config) ->
 1218:     #{scheme := "foo", host := "example.com", fragment := "合気道"} =
 1219:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1220:           uri_string:normalize(
 1221:             "foo://example.com#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])),
 1222:     #{host := "example.com", path := "/", fragment := "合気道"} =
 1223:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1224:           uri_string:normalize(
 1225:             "//example.com/#%E5%90%88%E6%B0%97%E9%81%93", [return_map])).
 1226: 
 1227: normalize_pct_encoded_negative(_Config) ->
 1228:     {error,{invalid,{host,{invalid_utf8,<<0,0,0,246>>}}}} =
 1229:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1230:           uri_string:normalize(#{host => "%00%00%00%F6",path => []}, [return_map])),
 1231:     {error,invalid_utf8,<<47,47,0,0,0,246>>} =
 1232:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1233:           uri_string:normalize(#{host => "%00%00%00%F6",path => []}, [])),
 1234:     {error,{invalid,{host,{invalid_utf8,<<0,0,0,246>>}}}} =
 1235:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1236:           uri_string:normalize("//%00%00%00%F6", [return_map])),
 1237:     {error,invalid_utf8,<<47,47,0,0,0,246>>} =
 1238:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1239:           uri_string:normalize("//%00%00%00%F6", [])).
 1240: 
 1241: interop_query_utf8(_Config) ->
 1242:     Q = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}]),
 1243:     Uri = uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/", query => Q}),
 1244:     #{query := Q1} = uri_string:parse(Uri),
 1245:     [{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query(Q1).
 1246: 
 1247: interop_query_latin1(_Config) ->
 1248:     Q = uri_string:compose_query([{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}], [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1249:     Uri = uri_string:recompose(#{path => "/", query => Q}),
 1250:     Uri1 = uri_string:transcode(Uri, [{in_encoding, latin1}]),
 1251:     #{query := Q1} = uri_string:parse(Uri1),
 1252:     [{"foo bar","1"}, {"合", "2"}] = uri_string:dissect_query(Q1).
 1253: 
 1254: regression_parse(_Config) ->
 1255:     #{host := "Bar",path := [],scheme := "FOo"} =
 1256:         uri_string:parse("FOo://Bar"),
 1257:     #{host := "bar",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1258:         uri_string:parse("foo://bar"),
 1259:     #{host := "A%2f",path := "/%62ar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1260:         uri_string:parse("foo://A%2f/%62ar"),
 1261:     #{host := "a%2F",path := "/bar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1262:         uri_string:parse("foo://a%2F/bar"),
 1263:     #{host := "%C3%B6",path := [],scheme := "FOo"} =
 1264:         uri_string:parse("FOo://%C3%B6").
 1265: 
 1266: regression_recompose(_Config) ->
 1267:     "FOo://Bar" =
 1268:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "Bar",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}),
 1269:     "foo://bar" =
 1270:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "bar",path => [],scheme => "foo"}),
 1271:     "foo://A%2f/%62ar" =
 1272:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "A%2f",path => "/%62ar",scheme => "foo"}),
 1273:     "foo://a%2F/bar" =
 1274:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "a%2F",path => "/bar",scheme => "foo"}),
 1275:     "FOo://%C3%B6" =
 1276:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "%C3%B6",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}),
 1277:     "FOo://%C3%B6" =
 1278:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "ö",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}).
 1279: 
 1280: regression_normalize(_Config) ->
 1281:     "foo://bar" =
 1282:         uri_string:normalize("FOo://Bar"),
 1283:     #{host := "bar",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1284:         uri_string:normalize("FOo://Bar", [return_map]),
 1285: 
 1286:     "foo://bar" =
 1287:         uri_string:normalize("foo://bar"),
 1288:     #{host := "bar",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1289:         uri_string:normalize("foo://bar", [return_map]),
 1290: 
 1291:     "foo://a%2F/bar" =
 1292:         uri_string:normalize("foo://A%2f/%62ar"),
 1293:     #{host := "a%2F",path := "/bar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1294:         uri_string:normalize("foo://A%2f/%62ar", [return_map]),
 1295: 
 1296:     "foo://a%2F/bar" =
 1297:         uri_string:normalize("foo://a%2F/bar"),
 1298:     #{host := "a%2F",path := "/bar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1299:         uri_string:normalize("foo://a%2F/bar", [return_map]),
 1300: 
 1301:     "foo://%C3%B6" =
 1302:         uri_string:normalize("FOo://%C3%B6"),
 1303:     #{host := "ö",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1304:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1305:           uri_string:normalize("FOo://%C3%B6", [return_map])),
 1306: 
 1307:     "foo://bar" =
 1308:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "Bar",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}),
 1309:     #{host := "bar",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1310:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "Bar",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}, [return_map]),
 1311: 
 1312:     "foo://bar" =
 1313:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "bar",path => [],scheme => "foo"}),
 1314:     #{host := "bar",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1315:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "bar",path => [],scheme => "foo"}, [return_map]),
 1316: 
 1317:     "foo://a%2F/bar" =
 1318:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "A%2f",path => "/%62ar",scheme => "foo"}),
 1319:     #{host := "a%2F",path := "/bar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1320:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "A%2f",path => "/%62ar",scheme => "foo"}, [return_map]),
 1321: 
 1322:     "foo://a%2F/bar" =
 1323:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "a%2F",path => "/bar",scheme => "foo"}),
 1324:     #{host := "a%2F",path := "/bar",scheme := "foo"} =
 1325:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "a%2F",path => "/bar",scheme => "foo"}, [return_map]),
 1326: 
 1327:     "foo://%C3%B6" =
 1328:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "%C3%B6",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}),
 1329:     #{host := "ö",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1330:         uri_string:percent_decode(
 1331:           uri_string:normalize(#{host => "%C3%B6",path => [],scheme => "FOo"},
 1332:                                [return_map])),
 1333: 
 1334:     "foo://%C3%B6" =
 1335:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "ö",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}),
 1336:     #{host := "ö",path := [],scheme := "foo"} =
 1337:         uri_string:normalize(#{host => "ö",path => [],scheme => "FOo"}, [return_map]).
 1338: 
 1339: recompose_host_relative_path(_Config) ->
 1340:     "//example.com/.foo" =
 1341:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "example.com", path => ".foo"}),
 1342:     <<"//example.com/foo">> =
 1343:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => <<"example.com">>, path => <<"foo">>}),
 1344:     ok.
 1345: 
 1346: recompose_host_absolute_path(_Config) ->
 1347:     "//example.com/foo" =
 1348:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "example.com",
 1349:                                path => ["/", "foo"]}),
 1350:     "//example.com/foo" =
 1351:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => <<"example.com">>,
 1352:                                path => [<<"/">>,<<"foo">>]}),
 1353:     "//example.com/foo" =
 1354:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => "example.com",
 1355:                                path => ["/f", "oo"]}),
 1356:     "//example.com/foo" =
 1357:         uri_string:recompose(#{host => <<"example.com">>,
 1358:                                path => [<<"/f">>,<<"oo">>]}),
 1359:     ok.
 1360: 
 1361: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1362: %% Quote tests
 1363: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1364: quote(_Config) ->
 1365:     TestQuote =
 1366:         fun(Unquoted, Quoted) ->
 1367:                 Quoted = uri_string:quote(Unquoted)
 1368:         end,
 1369: 
 1370:     [TestQuote(U, Q) || #{unquoted := U, quoted := Q} <- get_quote_data()],
 1371:     [TestQuote(U, Q) || #{unquoted_b := U, quoted_b := Q} <- get_quote_data()],
 1372: 
 1373:     Head = fun([H | _]) -> H;
 1374:                (<<H, _/binary>>) -> H
 1375:            end,
 1376: 
 1377:     TestQuoteUnquote =
 1378:         fun(Unquoted) ->
 1379:                 %% case below should be removed when functions used are removed
 1380:                 case Head(Unquoted) =< 127 of
 1381:                     true ->
 1382:                         Unquoted = http_uri:decode(http_uri:encode(Unquoted));
 1383:                     _ ->
 1384:                         ok
 1385:                 end,
 1386:                 Unquoted = uri_string:unquote(uri_string:quote(Unquoted))
 1387:         end,
 1388:     [TestQuoteUnquote(U) || #{unquoted := U} <- get_quote_data()],
 1389:     [TestQuoteUnquote(U) || #{unquoted_b := U} <- get_quote_data()],
 1390: 
 1391:     TestQuoteWithSafeList =
 1392:         fun(Unquoted, Quoted) ->
 1393:                 Safe = "!$()*", %% characters not encoded by old http_uri:encode
 1394:                 Result = uri_string:quote(Unquoted, Safe),
 1395:                 %% case below should be removed when function used are removed
 1396:                 case Head(Unquoted) =< 127 of
 1397:                     true ->
 1398:                         Result = http_uri:encode(Unquoted);
 1399:                     _ ->
 1400:                         ok
 1401:                 end,
 1402:                 case lists:member(Head(Unquoted), Safe) of
 1403:                     true ->
 1404:                         Unquoted = Result;
 1405:                     false ->
 1406:                         Quoted = Result
 1407:                 end
 1408:         end,
 1409:     [TestQuoteWithSafeList(U, Q) || #{unquoted := U, quoted := Q} <- get_quote_data()],
 1410:     [TestQuoteWithSafeList(U, Q) || #{unquoted_b := U, quoted_b := Q} <- get_quote_data()],
 1411: 
 1412: 
 1413:     ComposePath = fun (PathSegments, Safe) ->
 1414:                           lists:join("/", [uri_string:quote(S, Safe) ||
 1415:                                               S <- PathSegments])
 1416:                   end,
 1417: 
 1418:     %% / used as data see GH-5368
 1419:     ExampleURI1 = "https://internal.api.com/devices/Ethernet0%2F4",
 1420:     ExampleURI1 = uri_string:recompose(
 1421:                     #{scheme => "https",
 1422:                       host => "internal.api.com",
 1423:                       path => ComposePath(["devices", "Ethernet0/4"],
 1424:                                           "")}),
 1425: 
 1426:     %% sub-delims as data
 1427:     %% in this example ComposePath must treat sub-delims and '%' as safe character
 1428:     %% to avoid re-encoding encoded characters
 1429:     ExampleURI2 = "yeti://localhost/folder/file.txt,version=1%2C1",
 1430:     ExampleURI2 = uri_string:recompose(
 1431:                     #{scheme => "yeti",
 1432:                       host => "localhost",
 1433:                       path => ComposePath(["folder", "file.txt,version=" ++
 1434:                                            uri_string:quote("1,1")],
 1435:                                           ",=%")}),
 1436: 
 1437:     %% percent character as data
 1438:     ExampleURI3 = "yeti://localhost/folder/file_with_%25.txt",
 1439:     ExampleURI3 = uri_string:recompose(
 1440:                     #{scheme => "yeti",
 1441:                       host => "localhost",
 1442:                       path => ComposePath(["folder", "file_with_" ++
 1443:                                                uri_string:quote("%") ++ ".txt"],
 1444:                                           "%")}),
 1445:     ok.
 1446: 
 1447: get_quote_data() ->
 1448:     [%% reserved/gen-delims
 1449:      #{unquoted => ":", quoted => "%3A", unquoted_b =><<":">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3A">>},
 1450:      #{unquoted => "/", quoted => "%2F", unquoted_b =><<"/">>, quoted_b=> <<"%2F">>},
 1451:      #{unquoted => "?", quoted => "%3F", unquoted_b =><<"?">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3F">>},
 1452:      #{unquoted => "#", quoted => "%23", unquoted_b =><<"#">>, quoted_b=> <<"%23">>},
 1453:      #{unquoted => "[", quoted => "%5B", unquoted_b =><<"[">>, quoted_b=> <<"%5B">>},
 1454:      #{unquoted => "]", quoted => "%5D", unquoted_b =><<"]">>, quoted_b=> <<"%5D">>},
 1455:      #{unquoted => "@", quoted => "%40", unquoted_b =><<"@">>, quoted_b=> <<"%40">>},
 1456:      %% reserved/sub-delims
 1457:      #{unquoted => "!", quoted => "%21", unquoted_b =><<"!">>, quoted_b=> <<"%21">>},
 1458:      #{unquoted => "$", quoted => "%24", unquoted_b =><<"$">>, quoted_b=> <<"%24">>},
 1459:      #{unquoted => "&", quoted => "%26", unquoted_b =><<"&">>, quoted_b=> <<"%26">>},
 1460:      #{unquoted => "'", quoted => "%27", unquoted_b =><<"'">>, quoted_b=> <<"%27">>},
 1461:      #{unquoted => "(", quoted => "%28", unquoted_b =><<"(">>, quoted_b=> <<"%28">>},
 1462:      #{unquoted => ")", quoted => "%29", unquoted_b =><<")">>, quoted_b=> <<"%29">>},
 1463:      #{unquoted => "*", quoted => "%2A", unquoted_b =><<"*">>, quoted_b=> <<"%2A">>},
 1464:      #{unquoted => "+", quoted => "%2B", unquoted_b =><<"+">>, quoted_b=> <<"%2B">>},
 1465:      #{unquoted => ",", quoted => "%2C", unquoted_b =><<",">>, quoted_b=> <<"%2C">>},
 1466:      #{unquoted => ";", quoted => "%3B", unquoted_b =><<";">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3B">>},
 1467:      #{unquoted => "=", quoted => "%3D", unquoted_b =><<"=">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3D">>},
 1468:      %% other not unreserved
 1469:      #{unquoted => "<", quoted => "%3C", unquoted_b =><<"<">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3C">>},
 1470:      #{unquoted => ">", quoted => "%3E", unquoted_b =><<">">>, quoted_b=> <<"%3E">>},
 1471:      #{unquoted => "\"", quoted => "%22", unquoted_b =><<"\"">>, quoted_b=> <<"%22">>},
 1472:      #{unquoted => "{", quoted => "%7B", unquoted_b =><<"{">>, quoted_b=> <<"%7B">>},
 1473:      #{unquoted => "}", quoted => "%7D", unquoted_b =><<"}">>, quoted_b=> <<"%7D">>},
 1474:      #{unquoted => "|", quoted => "%7C", unquoted_b =><<"|">>, quoted_b=> <<"%7C">>},
 1475:      #{unquoted => "\\", quoted => "%5C", unquoted_b =><<"\\">>, quoted_b=> <<"%5C">>},
 1476:      #{unquoted => "^", quoted => "%5E", unquoted_b =><<"^">>, quoted_b=> <<"%5E">>},
 1477:      #{unquoted => "%", quoted => "%25", unquoted_b =><<"%">>, quoted_b=> <<"%25">>},
 1478:      #{unquoted => " ", quoted => "%20", unquoted_b =><<" ">>, quoted_b=> <<"%20">>},
 1479:      %% non-ASCII
 1480:      #{unquoted => "örebro", quoted => "%C3%B6rebro",
 1481:        unquoted_b =><<"örebro"/utf8>>, quoted_b=> <<"%C3%B6rebro">>},
 1482:      #{unquoted => "Łódź", quoted => "%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA",
 1483:        unquoted_b =><<"Łódź"/utf8>>, quoted_b=> <<"%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">>},
 1484:      %% unreserved non alpha, non digit characters
 1485:      #{unquoted => "-", quoted => "-", unquoted_b =><<"-">>, quoted_b=> <<"-">>},
 1486:      #{unquoted => ".", quoted => ".", unquoted_b =><<".">>, quoted_b=> <<".">>},
 1487:      #{unquoted => "_", quoted => "_", unquoted_b =><<"_">>, quoted_b=> <<"_">>},
 1488:      #{unquoted => "~", quoted => "~", unquoted_b =><<"~">>, quoted_b=> <<"~">>}
 1489:     ].
